entry.title: Hunger Management
entry.summary:
Author: dewkissedsoul

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,124Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Batman’s latest magical foe leaves him cursed—turned vampire and doomed to crave the one thing he wants most. As the spell put it: “You will hunger for what you desire most.”Unfortunately, what Bruce Wayne desires most is Clark Kent, and it’s not just his blood.
